replies.body:
Welcome to Avicus , its a very fun server to play on , hope to see you around . To stop yourself getting banned from this server I highly recommend you read these :

http://avicus.net/rules
If you are having troubles with the server or problems contact Avicus by filling in a forum .At here :
http://avicus.net/support then scroll to the bottom of the page !
Have fun !

replies.body:
Hey! Welcome to the server :D I hope you have a great time and I'll be seeing you in game! :D Btw, I'm a guy.

avicus Is illuminati
illuminati has 3 I's
avicus has 1 I
3+1=4
Four has 4 letters
4+4=8
Illuminati has 10 letters
10-8=2
PeachyYas is 2nd on the all time leader boards
Peaches, they grow from a plant
Plants, they have different parts, each like the government. 
Government, the government has Obama
Obama has 5 letters.
5+2=7
Avicus has 6 letters
7-6=1 illuminati has juan eye. 
Therefore, JuanoMC and avicus both are illuminati confirmed.....
